cells.data: -- doesDirectoryExist :: FilePath -> IO Boolon doesDirectoryExist(strPath)	set ca to current application	set oPath to (ca's NSString's stringWithString:strPath)'s ¬		stringByStandardizingPath	set {bln, int} to (ca's NSFileManager's defaultManager's ¬		fileExistsAtPath:oPath isDirectory:(reference))	bln and (int = 1)end doesDirectoryExist
